fields.value: Replication data for "Geographic and socio-demographic variation of cardiovascular disease risk in India: a cross-sectional study of 800,000 adults"

dsDescriptionValue.value: This is the data and code for the paper "Geographic and socio-demographic variation of cardiovascular disease risk in India: a cross-sectional study of 800,000 adults", which will soon appear in PLOS Medicine.

publicationCitation.value: Geldsetzer P, Manne-Goehler J, Theilmann M, Davies JI, Awasthi A, Danaei G, et al. (2018) Geographic and sociodemographic variation of cardiovascular disease risk in India: A cross-sectional study of 797,540 adults. PLoS Med 15(6): e1002581. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pmed.1002581

fields.value: Please contact me if you have any questions about using this data.

files.description: Cleans DLHS-4 raw data, which can be obtained from here: http://www.iipsindia.ac.in
files.label: 1_DLHS4_final_20170522.do

dataFile.description: Cleans DLHS-4 raw data, which can be obtained from here: http://www.iipsindia.ac.in

files.description: First step of AHS cleaning. AHS raw data can be obtained from here: https://nrhm-mis.nic.in/hmisreports/AHSReports.aspx

dataFile.description: First step of AHS cleaning. AHS raw data can be obtained from here: https://nrhm-mis.nic.in/hmisreports/AHSReports.aspx

files.description: Last step of AHS and DLHS-4 cleaning. Run this do-file after running the previous three do-files.
files.label: 4_w3_postmerge_20170522.do

dataFile.description: Last step of AHS and DLHS-4 cleaning. Run this do-file after running the previous three do-files.

files.description: This R code takes the cleaned AHS and DLHS (as per the Stata do-files above), does a little more cleaning, and then conducts the analysis.
